txt.en: Waldo Rumble would like to thank you for your participation in the Anniversary Festival today.

'My, you're a festive one! I hope you are having a fun time at the Anniversary Festival!

'It seems you're having a swell time, so perhaps you'll enjoy one of these rewards. Here you are!'

'Come back tomorrow and I shall have more rewards for you!'
Waldo Rumble is excited to welcome visitors to the Party Tree and encourages them to partake in all of the festival's activities.

'Welcome, my friend!

'If you are here for the Anniversary Festival, I would recommend you look around and participate in many of the fun activities around here. If you're not here for the Anniversary Festival, maybe you should be!

'For those folks that participate in many of our activities, there might just be a reward in store for you, so get out there!

'And remember, when lighting fireworks, it's safety first!'
Every day there is something to do for the Anniversary Festival. Come and join everyone in celebrating another lovely year and participate in the many Anniversary Festival activities!
